    ScriptableObjectUtility

    Contains utility methods for UnityEngine.ScriptableObject.

    Inheritance
    Object
    ScriptableObjectUtility

    Methods

    GetSingleton<T>(String, String)

    Gets a singleton instance of the specified type.

    public static T GetSingleton<T>(string assetPath, string resourcesPath)
    where T : ScriptableObject

    Save(ScriptableObject)

    Saves the UnityEngine.ScriptableObject.

    public static void Save(this ScriptableObject obj)
    Remarks

    Safe to call from outside editor, but has no effect.
